system.effect: When Ship is Crippled, Captain can choose to have either the ship's speed or Weapon Components Unaffected by the usual penalties for a Crippled Ship. Whenever this component is damaged, it has a 25% chance to explode, destroying it and dealing 1d5 hull damage, and setting another component of DM's choice on fire.
